## RotationInProgressError class

Thrown when a key rotation is requested while a previous rotation is still within its grace period (i.e. the previous key has not yet been retired).

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class RotationInProgressError extends VaultError 
```
**Extends:** [VaultError](./vaultkeeper.vaulterror.md)
